page.title: 05Convalmore Distillery.
page.content: Convalmore_Glenlivet Distillery Co. Ltd. was formed in June 1893. Production began in February 1894. The distillery is placed close to the railway,which although not in use as a regular service any more,would have been an advantage for easy transportation.In 1909 a catastrophe struck the distillery.A fire broke out near the tunroom.The stillroom was saved at great risk to human life.In 1972 a dark grains plant was built to process the residual matter from Glen_ dullan and Mortlach distilleries.
